properties.name: Admin password not updated in 30 days

alertDetailsOverride.alertnameFormat: Alert from Authomize - Admin password wasn't updated during the last 30 days
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Admin password wasn't updated during the last 30 days. The policy detects admin account where password wasn't updated during the last 30 days.

properties.description: The policy detects an administrative account where the password of the account was not updated in the last 30 days.
properties.query:
Authomize_v2_CL
| where ingestion_time() >= ago(30m)
| extend EventID = id_s, Policy = policy_name_s, Severity = severity_s,Description = description_s,Recommendation = recommendation_s,URL = url_s,Tactics = tactics_s
| where Policy has "Admin password wasn't updated during the last 30 days"
| project  EventID, Policy, Severity, Description, Recommendation, URL, Category, Tactics
